style.description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code\n            (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)
style.title: style

chore.description: Changes to the build process or auxiliary tools\n            and libraries such as documentation generation
chore.title: chore

perf.description: A code change that improves performance
perf.title: perf

ci.description: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts
ci.title: ci
